alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hardeman and western McNairy Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 943 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Pocahontas, or 11 miles northwest of Big Hill Pond State Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selmer, Pocahontas, McNairy, Bethel Springs, Middleton, Eastview, Ramer, Hornsby, Rose Creek, Hebron, Lisbon and Lacy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
